Class Connect4Instance

java.lang.Object
connect4.Connect4Instance
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Connect4Instance extends Object implements Serializable
This class defines methods that allow saving/loading a Connect4 and getters for the game board and a player's turn.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getPlayers

      public String[] getPlayers()
      Retrieves player 1 and 2's names in a String Array
      Returns:
      a String[] which holds player 1 and 2's names

    • getTurn

      public char getTurn()
      Retrieves and returns the upcoming player's turn
      Returns:
      a char which represents a player

    • getBoard

      public char[][] getBoard()
      Retrieves and returns a Connect4 game board
      Returns:
      an array of arrays of chars which is the game board

    • saveGame

      protected void saveGame()
      Saves a Connect4 game into a .dat file which will hold a Connect4Instance.

    • loadGame

      public static Connect4Instance loadGame()
      Loads in a Connect4 game from a .dat file if it exists, returning the Connect4Instance object
      Returns:
      the board game object, ReversiBoard
